0.1.name: wordpress/rattach
0.1.description:
Adds a list of any attached files to the end of posts and pages.

Attached files are displayed with a link so that they can be easily downloaded, along with a 16x16 icon identifying the type of file and file size.

Thanks to Mark James for the outstanding silk icon set, and for licensing it under the CC license.
